name: Antimatter Elevator (itch)
description:
A somewhat original puzzle game where you connect non-matching pieces to reach level 99.

Features
() Each game is randomized (and most likely beatable)
() Meaningless combo counter
() Now with ending

Accessibility
(+) No audio-only dialog
(+) All sound effects dispensable
(+) No color differentiation required
(-) Low contrast text
(-) Low contrast scenery
(+) No time limits to read on-screen text
(+) No time limits to complete in-game tasks
(+) In-game tutorial
(+) Simple menu
(-) No alternative difficulty levels
(+/-) Controller support for game but not menus
(-) No remappable controller buttons
(-) No remappable keyboard keys

System and License Requirements
